title: You’ve Unlocked a New Gift
headline: You’ve Unlocked a New Gift
subtitle: Hinterland Bomber Jacket
content:
Your gift of the Hinterland Bomber Jacket for buying or previously owning the Operations Terminal and Mammoth Thruster Upgrades for the Mammoth Avenger will be added to your wardrobe before July 21.

Stay tuned to the Rockstar Newswire for more limited-time events coming soon.
